column1: proto_msg1:[wave]Woah![/wave] Who the [rainbow]heck[/rainbow] are [shake rate=20 level=10]you?![/shake]\nMy... clone?
proto_msg2:...[wave]Who knows?[/wave]\nMaybe I'm you from the future!

column2: could you do me a favour maybe?\nThink you could me a [rainbow]{0}?[/rainbow]
silly!

column1: item_outofinventory:You don't have any more of this left!
coffee_needscup:Place a cup down before using the pourer!
coffee_toomuch:This cup already has enough espresso in it!
coffee_needmilkjug:You need a milk jug with milk to use the steam pipe!
coffee_last_none:You don't have any coffee on your head currently!
coffee_last_notcoffee:The top beverage on your head isn't coffee!
coffee_toomany:You're holding too many cups on your head!

column2: could I get a [rainbow]{0}[/rainbow]
I ordered a [rainbow]{0}[/rainbow]

column1: fox_wrongorder:Oh! I think you got the orders messed up?\nI ordered a [rainbow]{0}[/rainbow]...

column2: you've got no seats?\nThat's too bad. I'll come back another time.
awesome! Thanks!

column1: pause_day:Your job is to serve the customers coming in the coffees they order! Keep the satisfaction meter up by serving them in order to complete the day! Satisfaction goes down when you have not been attentive to the customers.
pause_night:You have the opportunity to grab any resources you can to take back to your café for the next day
column2: but be careful of the evil foxes! Make choices whether it's work the risk or not.

column1: tutorial_0:Welcome to [wave]Coff[/wave][wave]ee[/wave] [wave]Be[/wave][wave]an![/wave]\nA game where you play as Bean
column2: and take care of your customers during the day out of the kindness of your heart
column3: and foraging for resources during the night!

column2: you're in the [rainbow]Daytime[/rainbow] section.\nYou will make coffees for the customers!
and each day will progressively get more harder.\nUp in the [color=#eebb00]top right[/color] of the screen
column3: you can see the current Time of Day for this.

column1: tutorial_3:As customers come in and out
column2: your [color=#ee0000][shake rate=20 level=10]Satisfaction Meter[/shake][/color] will fluctuate.\nWhen customers are waiting for their orders
column3: the meter will go down. When you serve them

column2: a customer just so happened to drop by! Let's see what he'd like.\nGo up to the counter and press 'Z' to take the order of the first customer in the queue!

column1: fox_tutorial_speak:Hey there! I hear it's your first day
column2: congrats! May I please have a [rainbow]Espresso[/rainbow]?\nYou can take as long as you like!

column1: tutorial_5:Great! Brush is going to sit down at a table now and wait for you to serve him.

column2: we need to go to the coffee machine
column3: which is next to the counter.\nWhen there

column1: tutorial_7:This is the coffee machine. Bean's pride and joy!
tutorial_8:You will use this to make coffee for your customers. Luckily
column2: it's not too hard to use too.\nTechnology nowadays

column1: tutorial_9:Lets create our first [rainbow]Espresso[/rainbow] then. [color=#eebb00]Click on the cups on the right[/color] to place a new cup on the grid.

column2: the cup is now on the grid. Whenever you hover over a cup
column3: it'll tell you the name of the type of coffee it is.\nCurrently

column1: tutorial_11:Lets make this cup into a cup of [rainbow]Espresso[/rainbow].\nClick on the espresso button above the cup
column2: with the droplet icon

column1: tutorial_13:Now you can select on the cup. This will give you the option to [color=#00ee00]Serve[/color] or [color=#ee0000]Discard[/color] the drink.
tutorial_14:[color=#00ee00]Serve[/color] will place the cup on Bean's head
column2: which you can use to give to customers.\n[color=#ee0000]Discard[/color] destroys the drink and lets you start again.
we want to [color=#00ee00]Serve[/color] this drink. Click on the cup to select an option.

column1: tutorial_16:Now that you have placed the drink on Bean's head
column2: you can walk over to Brush to serve it to him.\nServe him by pressing the letter 'Z' while in front of him.

column1: tutorial_17:Excellent job! You've served your first customer. How convenient he shows up right as you're playing this tutorial.
tutorial_18:Bean can hold more than one coffee or other beverages on her head at once! However
column2: in order to keep her items balanced
column3: she slows down with the more items she holds.\nUse the sink to discard the top item off of her head! The sink is on the far left of the café.

column1: tutorial_19:Let's wait for another customer to stroll in.
tutorial_20:[rainbow]Double Espressos[/rainbow] are quite simple. Just press on the pour button again after making your first [rainbow]Espresso[/rainbow].
tutorial_21:Now it's time to learn how to use the Milk Jug. Head to the coffee machine.

column2: you want to pan down to the second section of the table.\nHover your mouse over the "vvvvv" panel at the bottom of the screen.
click on the Milk Bottle on the right side
column3: behind the jug.\nYou must pour the milk into the jug to use it.

column1: tutorial_24:Now that the jug is full
column2: you can use it with your coffee cup!\nClick on the [color=#0000ee]Move Up[/color] button on the jug to move it next to the cup.
pan back up to the screen by hovering over the reverse panel at the top of the screen.
in order to get the specific right coffee type
column3: you need to make sure of the espresso type ([rainbow]espresso[/rainbow] or [rainbow]double espresso[/rainbow]) and your [wave]ste[/wave][wave]am[/wave][wave] per[/wave][wave]can[/wave][wave]tage[/wave] are within ranges of the corrisponding drink.

column1: tutorial_27:You can check the [color=#ee0000]Recipe Book[/color] on the right to check the percentages of each!
tutorial_28:In order to change the Steam Percentage in the Milk
column2: you must hold down the Steam Pipe button.\nIt is above the milk jug

column1: tutorial_29:Hover over the jug to check the steam percentage. You can [color=#ee0000]Empty[/color] the jug to try again.\nKeep holding it down until you're at the percentage you need. Afterwards
column2: click [color=#00ee00]Pour[/color] on the jug!

column1: tutorial_30:Congratulations! You've completed the tutorial for the game so far. In the real game
column2: you can press "Escape" to pause at any time.\nNow you can learn about how the night system works!

column1: tutorial_night_none:There isn't a tutorial for night time in this build. Just go up to cows and coffee plants to collect items
column2: thats how you collect them for daytime. Hit Z on the hole in the middle to end the night. Hit X to kick foxes away. :)

column1: demo_limitation_0:Thanks so much for playing Coffee Bean! This is where the demo for the gamejam pretty much ends! The game isn't made to played after the 7th day or so due to it being likely impossible to complete.

column2: if you wish to keep playing regardless
column3: be our guest! Have fun!\nRemember you can end the run at any time in the pause menu :3
